Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ixodes ricinus defensin def2 (Ticks, Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=0.75 µM), Micrococcus luteus(MIC=0.37 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (MIC=25 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.21504572] It has 2.0% and 64.6% hemolysis at concentrations of 12.5 μM and 100 μM against human erythrocytes .
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Functional characterization of two defensin isoforms of the hard tick Ixodes ricinus.
Literature.Author: Chrudimska T, Slaninova J, Ruzek D, Rudenko N, Grubhoffer L.
